author: Neil Gaiman
quote: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better.

author: Marie Curie
quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.

author: Rosa Parks
quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

author: Kofi Annan
quote: We realize the importance of our voices only when we are silenced.

author: Carl Sagan
quote: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.

author: Neil Armstrong
quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.

author: Voltaire
quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

author: Basho
quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

author: J.K. Rowling
quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.

author: Napoleon Bonaparte
quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

author: Alexander Graham Bell
quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

author: Frida Kahlo
quote: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.

author: Abraham Lincoln
quote: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear; knowing what must be done does away with fear.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.

author: Vincent van Gogh
quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: The time is always right to do what is right.

author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.

author: Pablo Picasso
quote: I am seeking. I am striving. I am in it with all my heart.

author: Aung San Suu Kyi
quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.

author: Walt Disney
quote: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.

author: Bill Gates
quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.

author: Gloria Steinem
quote: When I dare to be powerful, to use my strength in the service of my vision, then it becomes less and less important whether I am afraid.

author: Dale Carnegie
quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong, but sometimes it is letting go.

author: Hermann Hesse
quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.

author: Aristotle
quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.

author: Aristotle
quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.

author: Emily Dickinson
quote: Not all those who wander are lost.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated.

author: Nietzsche
quote: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

author: Og Mandino
quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

author: Frank Lloyd Wright
quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: Silence is a source of great strength.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.

author: Barbara Jordan
quote: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

author: Tony Robbins
quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss it you will land among the stars.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Once you choose hope, anything's possible.

author: Marianne Williamson
quote: Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure.

author: Walt Disney
quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens, but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one that has been opened for us.

author: Christopher Reeve
quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

author: Sheryl Sandberg
quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated.

author: Brian Tracy
quote: The only limits to the possibilities in your life tomorrow are the buts you use today.
